snippet.title: The World's Hardest Game - On Steam! Trailer
snippet.description:
I present you The World's Hardest Game... On Steam! An aesthetic take on a classic browser game from 2008. Wait, are you sure you're ready to face The World's Hardest Game again? With aesthetic visuals and enhanced gameplay? Oh, and a revamped soundtrack? Alright. You can try.

Wishlist on Steam now! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2560490/The_Worlds_Hardest_Game__On_Steam/

Remix by Daniel "GlitchmanVGM" @ youtu.be/7FZGMSz_wxU
Original song "Growing On Me" by "Snayk" @ snayk.newgrounds.com
